tabs.faq_header: Tier1 Brand filters offer exceptional Quality and Value. Our products are proven to perform with rigorous testing protocols, offering similar quality as brand name OEM products but at a much lower price. We are proud of our quality - all Tier 1 filters have a 365 days no hassle return policy and are independently NSF 42 certified
tabs.faq_line_question_1: Do Tier1 products work as well as the named OEM brand?
tabs.faq_line_answer_1: Tier1 filters offer exceptional Quality and Value. Our products are proven to perform with rigorous testing protocols, offering similar quality as brand name OEM products but at much lower price. We are proud of our quality - all Tier1 filters have 365 days no hassle return policy and are independently NSF 42 certified.
